content: Vivacity Health processed claim #VH2023-41892 for Konnor Zielinski (PATIENT_ID: VH-ZK418), involving a complex spinal fusion procedure at Lakeshore Surgical Center. The procedure was necessitated by progressive cauda equina syndrome, with pre-authorization granted on 08/15/2023. Documentation includes neurosurgeon Dr. Elise Woodward's operative notes and post-op care plan through 10/01/2023. Out-of-network coverage was approved under exception policy VP403-2H.
